items.sentence: Tom listened to music in his room until late at night.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t intend to help Mary.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want to work for us.
Tom might not like it if we didn\'t come to his party.
We want to know what this project is going to cost us.
Tom told me he couldn\'t remember the teacher\'s name.
I must calculate how much money I\'ll spend next week.
Why are you always the one deciding everything for us?
Will we be the only students taking the exam tomorrow?
I\'ve always wanted to learn how to play the mandolin.
